column5: Found this video of my son Jack playing 'ice auger' when he was 2 days short of his 1st birthday, had to share.
Perfect example of a kid copying what we do; hilarious and good on him and his amagination. Loved the vid. Canâ€™t wait till my granddaughter is old enough to come out with me. Dan.
bahahaha that's hilarious!  Kind of reminds me of my daughter who used to put grass in the "grass tank" of her big red car.
